sourcesContent: /* Global Styles */ #app { font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif; /* Google font for a modern look */ -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale; text-align: center; color: #202124; /* Google dark gray color */ margin: 0; padding: 0; display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; min-height: 100vh; background: #f1f3f4; /* Google light gray background */ } /* Main Title Styles */ .main-title { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 36px; color: #202124; margin: 20px; } .main-title h1 { margin: 0; } .airplane-logo { width: 40px; /* Adjust size as needed */ height: 40px; /* Adjust size as needed */ margin-left: 10px; /* Space between title and logo */ } /* Section Styles */ .section { background: #fff; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); padding: 20px; margin: 20px; width: 90%; max-width: 500px; } /* Headings */ h2 { margin-bottom: 20px; font-size: 24px; color: #202124; /* Google dark gray color */ } /* Button Styles */ button { margin: 10px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 16px; cursor: pointer; background-color: #1a73e8; /* Google blue */ color: #fff; border: none; border-radius: 4px; transition: background-color 0.3s, transform 0.2s; } button:hover { background-color: #155ab6; /* Darker blue for hover */ transform: scale(1.05); } /* Click Counter Text */ .count-text { font-size: 18px; color: #5f6368; /* Google medium gray */ } /* Box Color Styles */ .color-box { width: 100px; height: 100px; margin: 20px auto; border-radius: 8px; transition: background-color 0.5s ease; } /* Carousel Styles */ .carousel { display: flex; flex-direction: column; align-items: center; justify-content: center; } .carousel-controls { display: flex; justify-content: center; margin: 10px; } .carousel-image-container { margin: 20px; } .carousel-image { width: 300px; height: 200px; border-radius: 8px; object-fit: cover; }
